notes: At least one of public_key, expiration_date, or name must be provided.

public_key.description: A valid PKCS#1 public key string.

name.description: A unique name for this key.

expiration_date.description: An ISO 8601 fomatted string: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ e.g. 2013-12-24T21:00:00Z in UTC timezone or the string 'infinity'.
